title: Iterative vs Recursive Approach
subject: Data Structures
theory:
Any recursive problem can be solved iteratively (loops). 
- **Recursion**: Cleaner code, Higher Space (Stack overhead).
- **Iteration**: Complex code, Lower Space (O(1) usually).

real_world_use_cases.description: Recursion often banned due to limited stack size. Iteration preferred.

summary: Choose recursion for logic (Trees), iteration for performance.
